projects.name: Data Analysis of Departmental Store Sales Using Python
projects.description: Data Analyst with expertise in Python, specializing in retail and departmental store data analysis. Proven track record of deriving actionable insights from large datasets to enhance business strategies. Proficient in data cleaning, visualization, and statistical analysis. Strong problem-solving skills with experience in creating comprehensive reports. Adept at using libraries such as Pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib.

projects.name: Online Travel Management System
projects.description: Developed a web-based application for booking flights, hotels, and travel packages using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and MySQL. Implemented secure user authentication, dynamic search functionality, and real-time booking confirmation. Integrated a payment gateway for seamless transactions. Designed an admin panel for managing users, bookings, and travel inventory.

experiences.description: Full Stack Developer with expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, PHP, and MySQL. Experienced in end-to-end web application development, combining front-end design and back-end database management. Developed a comprehensive website with both front-end and back-end functionalities to streamline the documentation of checklists and RPA (Robotic Process Automation) log forms used in the testing of drones. This website aims to facilitate a more efficient, accurate, and accessible system for managing drone testing documentation, enhancing overall productivity and quality assurance in the manufacturing process. Designed and implemented a user-friendly web interface for creating, managing, and reviewing test checklists and RPA log forms, including a robust back-end system to handle data storage, user authentication, and secure access to documentation.

full_output.name: THILAGAVATHI DHAYALAN
